description: This file defines mock data models and sample data for the home screen UI in an Android application. It includes data classes for PosterItem and RowData, as well as an object MockContent that provides two sample lists of content rows with media items.

classes.name: PosterItem
classes.description: Data class representing a media poster with an id, title, backdrop URL, and description.

classes.name: RowData
classes.description: Data class representing a row of content, with a title and list of PosterItems.

classes.name: MockContent
classes.description: Singleton object containing predefined sample data for the home screen, including trending and recommended movies.

methods.name: MockContent.rowTrending
methods.description: A predefined list of PosterItems labeled as 'Trending Now'.

methods.name: MockContent.rowRecommended
methods.description: A predefined list of PosterItems labeled as 'Recommended for You'.
